value.name: Cedar Grove and Verona Police Claim Trophy in Soccer Fundraiser for Families of Fallen Officers
value.description: Police officers from Cedar Grove and Verona took part in the inaugural PAPD indoor 5V5 Soccer Tournament at SOFIVE Meadowlands in Carlstadt.

value.name: Off-duty Pentagon police officer indicted on two counts of murder in Maryland
value.description: We’re going to focus in on the lives that have been lost in handling this matter.” Joseph Johnson, a cousin of James Johnson, said he recently went to his grave just to sit and be near him.

value.name: Required Reading
value.description: This week, the lack of Black board members at LA arts organizations, how a stolen Magritte painting may have funded terrorism, the NFT funhouse mirror, the Tulsa Race Massacre, and more.

value.name: Family Honors Man From Sacramento Mistakenly Shot And Killed By Idaho Police
value.description: after a man from Sacramento was shot and killed by Idaho police earlier this month. Though the department admits, Joseph Johnson was shot by mistake.

value.name: Crash-for-crash boxer ‘Kevin Heartbreak’ jailed for scam with reality TV star
value.description: A boxer calling himself Kevin Heartbreak who splashed out of a lavish lifestyle with the profits of a ‘cash-for-crash’ fraud has been jailed for four years. Hamid Sediqi, 36, orchestrated the fraud involving his girlfriend Belma Draganovic and reality TV star Mason Smith,

value.name: Jail for conman who cloned CMC and sold fake PI claims to law firm
value.description: A man has been jailed for fraudulent insurance claims and cloning a claims company to pass them to solicitors in return for referral fees.
